name: Awakened Evil Demo
description:
Retro action and platforming await, as you take on the forces of Evil! Inspired by the classics, navigate through hardcore linear stages that will test your skills, and give you a rewarding challenge!

*Awakened Evil is Currently in Development*

Controller (xbox)

  • Jump: A
  • Attack: X
  • Subweapon: Y
  • Pause: Start

Keyboard

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Jump: A
  • Attack: S
  • Subweapon: D
  • Pause: Space
  • Accept: Enter
  • Cancel: Esc

*Controls can be changed in Options*

**All versions are unsigned apps, so they might be flagged by your OS or Antivirus. The Linux and Mac versions are untested, so let me know if you find any bugs :) **
